socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that can hit enemies, or create minions. When those skills or minions kill enemies, or hit rare or unique enemies they will have a chance to summon a Phantasm minion, which uses a piercing projectile spell that deals physical damage.

from Supported Skills, deal a Killing Blow

from Supported Skills, Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
Phantasms last 15 seconds

Kaom bled for his people.
And so the people gave, the people bled,
So their King might go on."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom
